main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified aerial objects occurred in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania on March 21, 1954.
interesting points: Objects were reported to be flying in formation without any sound or exhaust trails., The objects appeared silver with rotating or pulsating lights from their ends., Witnesses described the objects as brilliant lights changing colors and making rapid directional changes., The sightings lasted between 2 to 10 minutes depending on the observer., Observers attempted to photograph the objects but were unsuccessful due to their rapid movements.
sighted object: unidentified aerial objects described as bright lights and silver-colored, circular in shape
witness description: An observer at 1612 E Chestnut Street reported seeing the objects.
